Herotext.title: Private Shopping at Osudio
Herotext.body: Book your Private Shopping moment and shop in complete safety. Book an appointment and come shopping before or after opening hours. We work with slots of 15 minutes, in which a limited number of people are always present in the store. you can easily keep your distance and enjoy Christmas shopping in a pleasant way. Moreover, with your Private Shopping visit you will receive a roll of gift-wrapping paper worth € 2 with a purchase from € 20.
Herotext.note: We closely monitor the corona measures. If your chosen moment is not possible, we will always propose an alternative.

Locations.title: Choose a location
